name: Money Bath VR / 札束風呂VR
description: A dream app that allows you to experience a money bath with VR! In addition, the life of the millionaire is fully reproduced! More fun girls will entertain you (rich man)! !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 300 MB available space
